response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our exclusive product to you. This item holds immense value to us, but we understand its potential worth to you might be even greater. We are offering this product to you at a special price of $11,000. This represents an exceptional opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset at a price below its market value.
